survey_name: Employee Satisfaction with Digital Wellness Programs Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate employee satisfaction and engagement with the company's digital wellness programs, including mental health apps, fitness challenges, and mindfulness tools provided by the organization.

questions.question_text: How frequently do you use the company-provided digital wellness programs (e.g., mental health apps, fitness challenges, mindfulness tools)?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice scale to measure frequency. Mobile-friendly with clear labels.

script.question_text: How frequently do you use the company-provided digital wellness programs (e.g., mental health apps, fitness challenges, mindfulness tools)?

questions.question_text: Which digital wellness programs have you used in the past 3 months? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice question to identify popular programs. Ensure the 'None of the above' option is included.

script.question_text: Which digital wellness programs have you used in the past 3 months? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How would you rate your overall satisfaction with the company's digital wellness programs?
questions.routing_logic: Appears to respondents who selected at least one program in Q2
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for satisfaction measurement. Mobile-friendly layout.

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the company's digital wellness programs?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Keep the text box responsive for mobile users.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the company's digital wellness programs?

questions.question_text: How has participation in digital wellness programs impacted your work-life balance?
